title: Finance Market Confidence Drops for February - Construction Equipment
content: Finance Market Confidence Drops for February  Construction Equipment
description:
The Equipment Leasing & Finance Foundation February 2022 Monthly Confidence Index for the Equipment Finance Industry (MCI-EFI) reported that confidence in the equipment finance market is 61.8, easing from the January index of 63.9.

The index reports a qualitative assessment of both the prevailing business conditions and expectations for the future as reported by key executives from the $900 billion equipment finance sector.
